entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
